I suppose getting to see Fujin and this sword was far from the worst outcome.
Ai-yah! Here I was, worried you were overcompensating! I suppose you'd be right at home in the Wang dynasty.
Impressive. I don't suppose I could give it a swing or two? I've never handled a drill like that.
I suppose this is your last chance to surprise us, ~name~...
I know my disguise wasn’t fooling as many people here as I’d have wished, but… if you have disguised yourself as a woman, ~name~, I would certainly be impressed.
You lost the bet, ~name~! What sort of combat style to like to employ? I’m quite skilled with a sword, but I admit the roar of a canon or the explosion of gunpowder really makes my fire rage.
A princess should love and be beloved by her people… but, it would seem you have a more direct interest in them. Have you ever been involved with a commoner?
Oh my, how exotic. That… thong, is something a courtesan would wear… but a high class one.
Huh! I haven’t seen underwear like that before. It just shows off everything so well! I might have to invest in a pair of those before I head home.
But as someone once said, a journey of a thousand miles…
Oh, come now, Catria. Well, don't come yet...
In truth, the rumors you hear of the other Princesses aren't wholly accurate...
Well, I guess now we'll see your true face!
Ah, you must be from a world near the Land of Dragons... I see that women there are... afforded more freedom, perhaps.
I respect your conviction, Crown Prince. If I weren't loyal to my emperor, I would surely find myself in the host of your elite warriors.
Hm. I've heard of some women covering themselves in flowers...
Well, Mushu is always nude. And Elsa has a bad habit about getting naked around Anna, and I don’t always think she’s quite human…
I guess we'll see...
Though, let's see how you look when you're alone and naked.
I was actually quite impressed with your underwear! It looks so comfortable... but...
Whoa, hold on, Twilight, there’s no need to be so vulgar so soon--
Oh. Nevermind then. I guess I should've trained more for this...
Surely, you're wearing underwear? Of some divine type?
Surely, unlike Futaba, you wore some kind of underwear?
I think you'd keep things very, very interesting, as a member of our society.
Not bad. More things like your ~clothing~ and you’ll be out in no time at all.
I'm no perfect porcelain doll. More like a training dummy. Uh, but smart. You can take more off next time, ~name~.
I'm uh, used to girls doing the flourish you're doing. Both of the jacket and of the trivia.
It's hard not to stare. You're so striking!
I would want to keep something like that in good condition, personally.
I hope you weren't planning on stopping there.
...and I'd wager you're made of stronger stuff than that, aren't you, Kamina?
Oh, no, Pit. Nothing at all. Only master warriors tend to wear white, since they can avoid getting dirt or blood on it. Impressive.
I imagine the two of you would get along well!
Are you certain you don't know any of these people? Hm. I suppose the world is a large enough place...
I’d taunt you about being beaten by a girl, but that seems a little demeaning to both of us.
I don’t want to seem entitled… but I had expected my reveal to be met more with applause. I suppose women aren’t very interesting to you, ~name~?
Hm. I suppose that's an acceptable play. Not thrilled it was your ~clothing~, if I'm honest.
Something bigger next time, right?
He’s even pale and kind of translucent!
I had to inherit mine, even though my father’s got a… slightly different build.
I'm a little less... cavalier than you about it.
--oh. Not the sword I had been expecting, but a lovely blade.
You know, I hadn't really considered that...
So you can stop time... I can think of a few uses for that.
Well, if that's true, Kamina, I suppose I gave it away earlier.
Man or woman, it's a virtue to fight someone so... persistent!
Do I need to tell you again not to underestimate me, Kamina? I don't mind proving it, either.
You certainly seem capable. I'm looking forward to further displays of bravery, here.
In my land, yellow is associated with rising spirits. I suppose with your wings, you're used to basking in the sunlight.
It's not a challenge, or anything. I was just... a little jealous.
I’ve only seen this a few times… but I can tell a lot based on sound and rustling sheets…
Let's see how a manly-man does it.
Women need their time, right? Time to put on makeup… to finish… to learn martial arts and defend the family honor… you know, sexy, uh, womanly things.
Is this how you say goodbye to those you’ve known, ~name~? Thinking of a romance shared under some falling petals? Um, don’t mind me. Just… thinking.
You lost your bet, D.Va. I want you to answer my question! How often do you have sex in your mech?
This game’s become… a little more open-minded than I’d anticipated it being…
Fapping? Did you mean Fa Ping? That’s uh, who I am, yes. Sometimes, anyway.
I suppose this is a little less weird than Elsa and Anna.
(What a woman!)
If you're as adept on the battlefield as you are in the bedroom...
Flexibility is important... after all...
Do you really think a man would do that, Lotte?
Oh... this is... quite...
Go on, Lotte, I want to hear more...
This is quite something!
At a brothel, once, I knew a woman who enjoyed being restrained... I see this is how spirits would do it.
I suppose you could get interesting angles if you were floating...
I've never watched a spirit do this... quite compelling, noble or not.
I lost my armor, but looks like ~name~’s the one who dropped her guard!
~name~, you look like you’re having fun! Trust me, you’ve seen one person naked, you’ve, uh, seen a lot of them naked?
Hey! ~name~, stand up at attention. Sorry, sorry, just used to commands. Take your time, but take it quickly.
This’s all in good fun, right, ~name~?
Find a path of your own, ~name~. Well, the path forward’s mostly full of peril and nudity. But I guess even you can be brave, can’t you?
A warrior knows when to admire another’s technique… when it comes your turn to lose, I can’t imagine how beautiful such a canvas will be, your fingers… slick with…
It's important to admire the trappings of others... such as when one glimmers in the soft flicker of a candle... ah… f-forgive me. A moment of poetry struck me.
You lost, Sayaka! Do these "witches" of yours often involve a sexual component? What was the worst thing you've done to slay a witch like that?
PH Challenge
My question, for our wager, ~name~: What world are you really from? What’s it like there? Most importantly, are you here to… pillow down with a human?
My question, from one person out of sorts to another, ~name~: Have you always felt like… you didn’t quite fit in with what was expected of you?
I know a blonde girl who can do crazy stuff with her hair. And that does mean all of it.
Hm... It's such a lighter shade than my own. Fascinating...
Most cats are pretty capricious… But do you also have the same types of urges that they do… as far as a need to breed? It would seem that way, based on what I can see from here.

When you’re a Princess, at least from my known worlds, there’s a certain… acceptance that people are going to love you for more than just your good deeds. Do you enjoy the fact people masturbate to you? I’m… uncertain.
You lost my challenge, ~name~! How did you really expect this to go? I’m not exactly shy… but you’re either very brave, or really foolish. I can respect either, but an honest answer would be nice.
Has your hair always been like that? I know that’s not a terribly interesting question, but most of the worlds I’ve visited or heard of have exotic styles rather than colors.
My question, ~name~, for our wager: So you’re a fairy… do all fairy godmothers have needs like this, or are you just the guardian of a rather unfortunate child?
I would’ve imagined a professional gambler’d have done better at a game of cards. What’s your favorite game besides this? And, while I’m at it, your favorite game to play while naked?
Oh, I see. Like Ariel's, or Merida's.
Goodness! I don’t pay any particular grooming attention to myself, but I don’t tend to get quite that hairy. Though part of me is certainly interested in exploring your mysterious forest, ~name~...

You lost the bet, ~name~! Is a game like this something you enjoy? I’ve heard of you before, ~name~, and it all seems to be very… lewd. I may have heard the stories at an army camp. The details are… lurid.
Are those horns made out of bone, or something softer? I… can see the merits of them, provided they aren’t too sharp in fulfilling some fantasies.
You’re a minstrel of some sort, or a census-taker, right? Given how you’ve sought to record so much information today. It’s a little nice to be the one getting the attention now though, isn’t it?
You lost the bet, ~name~! Are you doing anything after this? You seem like you could use some attention, and I’d promise to be gentle…
Did you pick your outfit, ~name~, or was it given to you? I have to think something so frilly makes it quite… breezy to move around with. Do you ever imagine using your ribbons for something else?
Now that you’ve lost the challenge, are you going to start being nice, or do you want me to punish you? I’ve learned a few very persuasive tricks…

Piloting a machine is much like riding a horse… but I can’t say I’ve ever taken care of myself while riding. It seems… awful to do that to Khan. But you have a room to yourself in your mech. Do you regularly masturbate or sleep with people there?
My question, ~name~: When you tend to your patients, ~name~, is it purely clinical? I… would honor my duties, but I would certainly think about them when I’d finished tending to them.
So, from one soldier to another, and since you lost: It was always… different, to try and satisfy myself at camp. Any advice for how you slip away?
So, ~name~, you lost! What exactly do you serve as a model for?
You lost the bet, ~name~, but here's an easy one. Do you try to be so cute and sweet? Or is it honestly just something that comes naturally? That would explain why I’m me, I suppose.
I know hungry ghosts and dragons are real, of course. What princess or sensible person doesn’t… but you’re not just here to find a breeding partner, right, ~name~?
My question, ~name~, since you lost: Does it hurt to be pierced like that? It seems like a bit much just for more places to wear jewelry.
Here's my question, since you lost, ~name~. What was the biggest haul of treasure you’ve ever claimed, ~name~?
I don’t think I’ve ever met someone with such pointed ears! Is your hearing exceptional? Can you hear my heartbeat? I’m… quite compelled by you, ~name~. That's my question, since you lost.
Here's my question, ~name~, since you lost the bet: As a prince, you doubtless have many options for concubines or wives. Was it you who organized this game?
A princess should love and be beloved by her people… but, it would seem you have a more direct interest in them. Have you ever been involved with a commoner?
So, ~name~, you lost the bet: How’d you get those scars?
It’s so… smooth! Are you naturally hairless, or is this just something you do to feel comfortable? I’m certainly intrigued!
You lost the challenge, ~name~! Here's my question: Are you the ghost of a man or woman, or something else, ~name~?
Well, ~name~, you lost! I’ll admit, I wasn’t much for academics. What’s your favorite subject? I know it isn’t a terribly exciting question, but I make the questions on my terms.
To style your bush like that… certainly is enticing. It looks very flattering on you, ~name~. I admire a woman who can chart her own course.
I’ve heard that the unquiet dead often seek out the living to slake unholy lusts… I never would’ve imagined it was a literal lust. Does that concern you, ~name~?
Can you use your wings to fly, or do you prefer them to shelter your paramours? Can I touch? At least answer the first part, since that was the condition of our game, after all.
I'd hope it'd be you that lost the bet, ~name~. How exactly does your magic work?
...begins with a single strip. Step. Eheh. Just worry less and fight harder, I suppose.
I have a vague worry that you’re going to hit someone by the end of this… and that’s not really in good taste…
I’ve blown up a cannon on myself before, but nothing like this…
This can’t actually be that dangerous, can it?
Well, Akko, this doesn't seem like the first time you've lost at something. But tell me, have you ever masturbated or had sex while transformed?
You lost, Ann. You seem to have a close tie with your other Phantom Thieves. Do you ever fantasize about them?
Huh? Do all women in your division look like that?
Oh, I see. Women with blue hair don't have hair there, I suppose.
Oh, I see. Women with blue hair don't have hair there, I suppose.
You fought well, Ms. Gunslinger. Tell me, do you enjoy firing that gun you've mentioned for more than just killing enemies...?
You lost the challenge, D.Va! My question: How often do you pillow down in your mech?
Though Elizabeth insists she's not a Princess, I insist that this is the first royal... edifice... I've seen.
I win the bet, Futaba! Why didn't you preserve your modesty with your headphones and glasses?
I've won the bet, Gwen! I'm uncertain if I have alternate versions of myself. How does it feel to be unique?
You've lost, ~player~. I want to know what you think about the game! Feel free to make a post on the subreddit. Making a character is easy, if you have a friend for us!
I won my bet, Ini! My question: which personality of yours do you find more successful in bringing people home?
It... it doesn't match! How'd you do that!?
You seem quite interested in ~Player~. But I might be as worthy of a challenge, eh, Juri?
Well, Lotte, I think I won my duel! Have you ever talked to the spirit inside one your... personal toys, before?
You lose, Marinette. Why were you chosen for your magic?
Oh, I see. Women with blue hair don't have hair there, I suppose.
Well, I don't think I'd want to be legendary for this, Crown Prince...
She lost... so, Natsuki... would you prefer if ~player~ were a man, or a woman? You seem conflicted!
...but I've never heard of any woman, spirit or human, that wore flowers anywhere but her head.
Sorry, forgive the rambling, you look wonderful in the flesh-- uh, you’d look good as a statue too, I think.
Y-you don't wear underwear. What a strange... choice.
I've won battles less attired... well, I do have hair... what an odd appearance.
How could I not look? Your hair is pink, even down there! You are heavenly, Sayori!
Oh, I see. Women with blue hair don't have hair there, I suppose.
Oh, I see. Women with blue hair don't have hair there, I suppose.
Since you lost, Sei... what's the best drunk sex you've had?
Impressive! I've used fireworks a few times myself!
Well, Princess Butterfly, you've been bested. What is the hardest burden of rulership you face?
Good effort Terra, but not good enough. It seems quite difficult for you to catch a break. What's the luckiest you've ever felt?
Looks like someone had something to prove!
You lost, Ochako, but not for trying. You come from a world where powers are common. If you had been able to pick yours, what would you have wanted?
Well, if an expert does it, maybe I should shave...
Given how... prim. How prim you are, Zizou, I was expecting something less... of a full moon.
Judging by your... ah, overall appearance, you would certainly be good variety...
Hope you don’t mind thinking of me, even though I’m not a man.
I think Rapunzel’s mentioned something similar, though I doubt she uses her hair for what… you are, Amalia.
See! You are a princess! How else do you explain the magical powers you just used!
Ai-yah! What's this!?
I hope it was worth it, ~name~!
Sloppy play, ~name~.
Though, I’ll admit I’m usually the one asked for advice on underwear… by men like you.
You say that like you haven't been waiting for it.
Glad to see you aren't a pushover, Jotaro.
I'd be offended if you started giving up the fight now.
As Ping or as Mulan...
Picky, picky, picky…
Are we in this together, or not, ~name~?
Being polite and demure might make one a good wife, but a rather frustrating opponents in cards.
It’s actually quite a challenge to get on the roster as a woman. I suppose I appreciate you not going easy on me.
I get it! You must talk to plants! That’s quite the talent.
I see! Did you come to look at spears tonight, Catria?
Love the hairstyle and qipao, Chun-Li. I feel like we’re gonna be good friends.
And to let you wear such a feminine outfit… That Overwatch place is doing something right.
Huh? You aren't a princess? You could've fooled me!
I-I'm not familiar with princesses at all! That's why I asked. I guess a princess wouldn't just lift her skirt like that, though...
I guess every princess should have something that's iconic and special.
You should learn to use your bracelets to propel you to new heights, Ini. I did that once.
Sigh. At least she's reasonably cute.
Let’s just say I’m sure both of us are familiar with various varieties and split the difference, hm, Kyu?
I know quite a few princesses. You seem to act more like them than the witches I usually hear about. A witch princess, even.
It looks lovely! If you want to talk about bad hair days, you should meet Rapunzel. I think she's from a world near yours...
If we could not ruin some surprises, Mahiru, I’d be quite grateful.
Thank you for continuing to do our people proud, Mei.
Perhaps I should talk to you about modernizing my armor… against the cold, if nothing else.
As you can tell by my attire, I like to remain mobile. That looks... very tight.
I hope you didn't plan to win by deceiving us, Crown Prince.
Uh. Nevermind me. I'll just... be here. Eating my words.
If I knew we could've come in our modern apparel, I could've forgone the bulky armor...
Such a young girl, and so convicted. I imagine that your friends and ancestors are proud of you. Do they allow women in the army, from where you’re from?
Thank you, Lady Palutena, you honor me.
Hm. I thought this would be a friendly game of cards...
I may keep secrets, but I don’t bring shame upon my ancestors with every action!
I don't think I take it your extreme, nor would I ever.
Though, it is much nicer to do so in cards or words rather than with swords or explosions or avalanches.
You do have dragons where you’re from… right?
I'm glad you're something of a witch-hunter. Many princesses struggle with witches, you know.
I’m impressed! By a woman doing that kind of a job. Definitely really impressive. Really, really impressive.
You're quite skilled at cards, Sheena! How are you doing those tricks...?
I just thought it odd that your clothing is so bright, but it seems designed to be stealthy.
You're a little irreverent, Zizou. I suppose you don't require much... deference... from mortals.
I see. I was wondering if... nevermind.
It's important to enjoy the little things in life. But I think it's worth savoring the big ones too. Like your ~clothing~, ~name~.
I'm just impressed you can keep pace with me. Any other contests you think you want me to beat you at?
Don't worry, ~name~, I'm sure some nice woman will make a great househusband of you yet.
It’s nice to be able to ask a man about lacy, feminine things without having a grunt or overt response.
I'll be honest, I was expecting a bit more decorum, Jin.
20,000 of anything sounds really expensive. You're quite the sharp dresser.
Ha! Well said. And... impressive. The speech, and...
Though I'm not sure who'd find it more arousing than just inspiring.
That’s… quite alluring. Your face captures your enjoyment well.
You aren't going to stop time and make us miss it, are you?
I'll certainly be learning from the experience, after all.
Many women don't appreciate the effort that goes into a physique like that. Believe me when I tell you I admire the hard work more than just the result.

It’s easy to tell when someone else has the bearing of a soldier.

I see video games have caught up to the catchy tunes of Disney movies.
Hm… I see your world keeps an open mind about their heroes. And their weaponry. Shall we spar?
There’s something very unusual about you, ~name~... You don’t happen to be some sort of spirit? If so, have you met Mushu, one of the many Fa spirit guides?

He’s so delicate…
Your armor fits like a glove.

Took you long enough. Keep that up, and I might just fall for you.

I'm hoping you're keeping the glasses.
I'll admit, I love a rousing speech.
You're not from around here, are you, Pit?
Your attire is quite unusual, Ryuji, if you don't mind me saying.
If you were going to think of me, looking so put together in my armor…
I have bested conquerors, impersonated someone who never existed, and been canonized as a Princess over many more deserving. But this? This is the strangest moment of my life by far.
What witchcraft is this?
The best trick you can learn during undressing is knowing how to direct people’s attention. Either towards you, or away. What’re you going to choose, manly man ~name~?
Did you stub your toe, or are you just mad you lost in front of a woman, ~name~?
Don’t get too excited, ~name~. I’m flattered a little neck is all you really needed to see from me, but I’m going to be embarrassed if that’s all the distraction you can handle.
Really, ~name~? Come on. Show me that raging fire. Win the next one.
Well, stranger, what'll it be?
Come on, ~name~, let's see you rise to the challenge!
~Name~? Hm. I wonder...
Okay, it's ~name~ this time. Let's hope it's something...
Well... it won't be the first time a man gets a dressing down in front of me...
What's next, ~name~?
Hm... it's always good to study other forms... of combat...
Oh… ~name~. It’s bigger than mine, at least. Uh, sorry if that’s… embarrassing to you. It… has to be uncomfortable for a woman to be more man than you.
PH Challenge
My question, for our wager, ~name~: What world are you really from? What’s it like there? Most importantly, are you here to… pillow down with a human?
My question, from one person out of sorts to another, ~name~: Have you always felt like… you didn’t quite fit in with what was expected of you?
Most cats are pretty capricious… But do you also have the same types of urges that they do… as far as a need to breed? It would seem that way, based on what I can see from here.

When you’re a Princess, at least from my known worlds, there’s a certain… acceptance that people are going to love you for more than just your good deeds. Do you enjoy the fact people masturbate to you? I’m… uncertain.
You lost my challenge, ~name~! How did you really expect this to go? I’m not exactly shy… but you’re either very brave, or really foolish. I can respect either, but an honest answer would be nice.

My question should be pretty easy, ~name~: Has your hair always been like that? I know that’s not a terribly interesting question, but most of the worlds I’ve visited or heard of have exotic styles rather than colors.
My question, ~name~, for our wager: So you’re a fairy… do all fairy godmothers have needs like this, or are you just the guardian of a rather unfortunate child?
You lost the bet, ~name~! What sort of combat style to like to employ? I’m quite skilled with a sword, but I admit the roar of a canon or the explosion of gunpowder really makes my fire rage.
I would’ve imagined a professional gambler’d have done better at a game of cards. What’s your favorite game besides this? And, while I’m at it, your favorite game to play while naked?

You lost the bet, ~name~! Is a game like this something you enjoy? I’ve heard of you before, ~name~, and it all seems to be very… lewd. I may have heard the stories at an army camp. The details are… lurid.
Are those horns made out of bone, or something softer? I… can see the merits of them, provided they aren’t too sharp in fulfilling some fantasies.
You’re a minstrel of some sort, or a census-taker, right? Given how you’ve sought to record so much information today. It’s a little nice to be the one getting the attention now though, isn’t it?
You lost the bet, ~name~! Are you doing anything after this? You seem like you could use some attention, and I’d promise to be gentle…
Did you pick your outfit, ~name~, or was it given to you? I have to think something so frilly makes it quite… breezy to move around with. Do you ever imagine using your ribbons for something else?
Now that you’ve lost the challenge, are you going to start being nice, or do you want me to punish you? I’ve learned a few very persuasive tricks…

Piloting a machine is much like riding a horse… but I can’t say I’ve ever taken care of myself while riding. It seems… awful to do that to Khan. But you have a room to yourself in your mech. Do you regularly masturbate or sleep with people there?
My question, ~name~: When you tend to your patients, ~name~, is it purely clinical? I… would honor my duties, but I would certainly think about them when I’d finished tending to them.
So, from one soldier to another, and since you lost: It was always… different, to try and satisfy myself at camp. Any advice for how you slip away?
So, ~name~, you lost! What exactly do you serve as a model for?
You lost the bet, ~name~, but here's an easy one. Do you try to be so cute and sweet? Or is it honestly just something that comes naturally? That would explain why I’m me, I suppose.
I know hungry ghosts and dragons are real, of course. What princess or sensible person doesn’t… but you’re not just here to find a breeding partner, right, ~name~?
My question, ~name~, since you lost: Does it hurt to be pierced like that? It seems like a bit much just for more places to wear jewelry.
Here's my question, since you lost, ~name~. What was the biggest haul of treasure you’ve ever claimed, ~name~?
I don’t think I’ve ever met someone with such pointed ears! Is your hearing exceptional? Can you hear my heartbeat? I’m… quite compelled by you, ~name~. That's my question, since you lost.
Here's my question, ~name~, since you lost the bet: As a prince, you doubtless have many options for concubines or wives. Was it you who organized this game?
A princess should love and be beloved by her people… but, it would seem you have a more direct interest in them. Have you ever been involved with a commoner?
So, ~name~, you lost the bet: How’d you get those scars?
You lost the challenge, ~name~! Here's my question: Are you the ghost of a man or woman, or something else, ~name~?
Well, ~name~, you lost! I’ll admit, I wasn’t much for academics. What’s your favorite subject? I know it isn’t a terribly exciting question, but I make the questions on my terms.
I’ve heard that the unquiet dead often seek out the living to slake unholy lusts… I never would’ve imagined it was a literal lust. Does that concern you, ~name~?
Can you use your wings to fly, or do you prefer them to shelter your paramours? Can I touch? At least answer the first part, since that was the condition of our game, after all.
I'd hope it'd be you that lost the bet, ~name~. How exactly does your magic work?
You've lost, ~player~. I want to know what you think about the game! Feel free to make a post on the subreddit. Making a character is easy, if you have a friend for us!
A diversionary tactic…? Huh, I figured you’d be a little more brave.
I should slap-- I should punch you.
I suppose royalty are kind of built like… uh, fine china.
Must be nice to get a new set every generation.
I'm no stranger to conflict, either, especially from nearby borders.
...Very forward, if you mean what I think--
Wha-- what was that? So fast!
Think you can take me in a fight? I know all kinds of competitions, uh, big guy.
You do seem like the kind of man to rise to an occasion, after all.
I certainly hope you didn't plan on holding back now.
How about what now?
What's your home world like? Are all the soldiers like you?
A sash or a banner is a fine way of showing one's colors.
Don’t worry ~name~, you’ll have time to catch your breath.
Oh, that is a lovely surprise, to be honest. It’s such a mess… um… cleaning up, otherwise.
Oh! Was--was I the only one to see that? Something dragon-spirit-y? How lucky to have you here at this game, Corrin!
W-what was that? I'm not... a stranger to this, but... I've never seen it glow!
It would seem you were quite frustrated, Jotaro. It's unhealthy to bottle up your urges...
Were you so angry because you needed to climax...? Maybe I'll just be mad to show you how it feels...
I'd love to watch that again, Kamina. Later, perhaps...
Don’t worry, don’t worry, ~name~! Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.

Have you heard of Green Destiny, Jin? Your blade reminds me of that tale.
A pleasure to meet you as well, little witch!
I see. I can carry a tune myself. I don't suppose you'd like to teach me your melodies, Lotte?
I'm sure you have, uh, many exciting stories to share with us, Lotte!
Well, Lotte? Is that where you find inspiration for your "Fanfic"?
The Tung Shao pass, near the Great Wall, has a beautiful snowscape and numerous cozy villages, Meia. I'd start there.
Women from the Land of Dragons don't usually groom there. Some do elsewhere, but... what's wrong with what's natural?
Well, Sayaka? Tell us.
Though, I'm sure I could make some fireworks fly if you and I got together after the game, Sheena.
Come on, Natsuki. ~player~'s right there!
I'm surprised to see a trainer here. I'm open to new lessons, Ms...?
I guess when you're particularly skilled, you become known only as the master of your art. Right, Trainer?
I've done lots of conditioning and martial arts, Ms. Trainer. Any extra tips or suggestions based on my physique?
Your bush is two-toned! How exotic!
Szechuan beef sounds great, heavy on the sauce, please.
Feel free to answer, Ini.
The floor is so cold! Good thing I’ve gotten used to cold lakes and early morning bathing, I suppose.
You are nothing if not excitable, Kamina. I admire that.
I wore some modern shoes the one time we had a princess applicant-- and why, yes, how else would you do it, Mia?
The floor is so cold, like an early morning bath... Oh um. Yes, Pit, but they're quite rare, or too hot!
I wore some modern shoes to Aurora’s the one time someone decides to film for a new Princess applicant. Aurora’s carpet is filthy, I’ll have you know.
I think the stuff you work for ends up being the work that’s most impressive. But, you did already get me out of my armor… and my disguise.
Hmm… I suppose you’re expecting my sword by now… don’t worry, I’m not going to do any fancy tricks with it, but I’m still not really interested in parting with it just yet.
I suppose it wouldn’t hurt to show a little leg… or whatever does it for you. It’s a little flattering you’re trying to hard to beat me. Or maybe you’re mad I tricked you earlier. Either way…
Don’t worry, I’m not going to stop being sash-y.
To be honest, I hardly notice at this point. I probably respond more readily to that than Mulan, really...
Yes, I can see a small resemblance between us, Sheena. Is your world near mine?
I really liked how I was playing. Didn’t you? Time for something small that ends up showing quite a bit...
Well... my wraps aren't as supportive as Ms. Trainer's bra, so they're at least a little more comfortable to get out of...
I lost my armor, but looks like ~name~’s the one who dropped her guard!
~name~, you look like you’re having fun! Trust me, you’ve seen one person naked, you’ve, uh, seen a lot of them naked?
Hey! ~name~, stand up at attention. Sorry, sorry, just used to commands. Take your time, but take it quickly.
This’s all in good fun, right, ~name~?
Find a path of your own, ~name~. Well, the path forward’s mostly full of peril and nudity. But I guess even you can be brave, can’t you?
I feel like Overwatch is the Disney of shooters. Your Tracer would make quite the Disney Princess, I think!
An explorer? Must be nice to go where you please, do as you’d like…
Hmm… ~name~, if it’s not obvious yet, I find you pretty relatable.
So, ~name~, I’ve noticed you try and look very… neutral. I think it’s important to ask why, just to give you a chance to explain, if you’d like.
I don’t think I’ve seen that craft of armor before! I’ve always been fascinated by such things. It looks really tailored to you, too.
Womanly armor. Who’d make such things?
What’s the story of your blade, ~name~? Mine is a family relic, handed down through ancient times… Though I did win Shan Yu’s sword after the battle at the Palace…
I see you have a sword! I have one too. Obviously. They're very tough and manly.
Oh, what kind of story are you from, ~name~? I’m from a story, but I think mine’s been adapted and changed over the years…
A bounty hunter? Like a mercenary? While some policies in the Land of Dragons might be a bit… backwards, I generally trust the magistrates.
What a lawless place you must be from, bounty hunter. I suppose you're some sort of wanderer too, huh?
I think cartoons can have important messages, right, ~name~?

I think we have a rich cultural heritage in common, ~name~! But I’m the Mulan from the Land of Dragons, not just China. Stories have a way of taking on a life of their own… such as by having this game be one of my adventurers…
Such vivid hair! Is it common where you're from?
That’s such a small cannon you have… I bet it doesn’t even cause big explosions.
Your alchemists must be clever, arming you with such a small cannon.
A cannon can be useful, but I’ll always prefer the steel of a sword or the meat of my fists. That uh, sounds suitably masculine, right?
I’m no stranger to magic… well, I’m not very familiar with it… but I’ll always prefer bone and steel to sorcery.
So you… pilot mecha? Who doesn’t want to be part of something bigger than themselves, right, ~name~?
I actually do know a bit about mecha stuff. Engineering is fascinating.
It’s easy to tell when someone else has the bearing of a soldier.
What sort of battles have you fought in, ~name~? It’s easy to tell when someone’s disciplined.
~Name~’s a bit unnatural… but the only monsters I’ve ever met are human. I’ll give you a chance to prove yourself, ~name~. You deserve that much.
I see video games have caught up to the catchy tunes of Disney movies.
A Princess? I don’t suppose you know Ariel, Aurora, or uh, any of the Disney Princesses not named Mulan, do you?
Hm… I see your world keeps an open mind about their heroes. And their weaponry. Shall we spar?
There’s something very unusual about you, ~name~... You don’t happen to be some sort of spirit? If so, have you met Mushu, one of the many Fa spirit guides?
Men don’t have acidic sweat. They can even smell kind of nice after a long day’s work.
A lot of men are happy to pursue women they can be equal partners with. Sometimes you play offense, they play defense. If you’re into that kind of thing.
I’ve never actually run into a witch, but they’re pretty spooky. You seem spookily pretty, though.
I’m very impressed, Aella!
Aella, I know it’s tough trying to fit into a world where you’re a little different.
Duck and cover!
She’s doing it again?!
Everyone, defensive formations!
Get under the bar, or the table, or whatever we’re doing here!
You’re a princess, aren’t you, Amalia?
Another female soldier. It's nice that you can be open about your service to your nation, Catria.
So you fight to avenge your father, right?
Your country lets women fight…?
Huh. What kingdom are you from, Princess Elizabeth?
I was expecting something fun tonight. Not Ditz Poker Night.
Fools can be gentle, but not for a game like this!
W-what?
I can at least sympathize with pretending to be someone else... we all have our masks...
Oh, come now, Miss.
Some bluff, Princess ordinary girl.
I respect your forwardness, Juri.
It's sad your bravery is so cruel.
Those pants did look... quite tight. I'm surprised, given how free your leggings seemed.
A love spirit…?
Lotte, you are a witch, aren't you?
Oh, so you are the type of witch that wears underwear, right?.
A… camera…?
Why, hello, beautiful.
Brr… I’ve spent a lot of time in the icy mountains…
Your armor is so fascinating, Meia. Do women from Mejare have such form-fitting attire?
Hm... Your armor doesn't leave much to the imagination, but I still wonder how you take it off...
You're terribly unfamiliar with men, aren't you, Meia?
A Taoist crown prince? If you are looking for soldiers to defend the Emperor, I would be honored to lend my sword to your cause.
A uniform?
Whether you’re a baker’s daughter, or a soldier…
I'm used to pyrotechnics, O Great Spirit. You're probably really tiny, right?
It's still a bit weird to get naked with a guide...
You're just like a little doll, Navi!
An evil spirit?!
...I’ve been meaning to ask, Nayru, are you human?
Palutena, you’re some sort of great spirit, aren’t you?
I’ll be honest, Palutena, I haven’t ever imagined a spirit naked before…
H-how are you just floating like that? Are you a princess, or a witch?
Where did you get that belt?
Do you even have anything left besides your underwear? Are you even wearing...?
Did your maid-servant come to supervise you, Remilia?
You're certainly confident for someone who's lost.
Tch Ai-yah. Drunk little girl, go home.
I think I may have poked the hornet's nest.
It wouldn't surprise me if you treated Sakuya as a layer.
You look like you know a thing or two about being dishonorable, Revy.
The honorable thing to do would be to surrender, Revy.
A valued piece of advice, Revy…
I’ll stay my attack, Rinkah, but…
The Flame Tribe… and where is that located, relative to the Great Wall…?
It’s so nice to meet a woman as spirited as you, Rinkah!
Surely, you're wearing some sort of underwear?
A woman that’s a logistics officer?
(Oh... it's like one of those stories. I suppose Sayori and ~player~...)
Goodness, you're quite nervous. Couldn't you take off your shoes?
I'm not going to make it easy on you, Sayori, but I admire your spirit! Stay strong like that!
I've heard of you, Tracer! I think you'd make quite the Disney Princess, if I do say so.
Purple skin… huh…
Speaking of supportive bras, I could use my hands instead and--
You're dressed... very comfortably, Miss...?
I know you're a little sweaty, but that top looks very... supportive...
...Finally, a chance to make the joke. As supportive as your bra was...
Are you really a goddess?
You’re certainly very assured…
I’ll admit some degree of envy to a woman who is so unconcerned for herself. It must be nice not having to worry about how others perceive you.
W-well. I don't think many of the Princesses I know are this forward...
I wonder who I'd have to talk to to bring you into the Princesses...
Time for you to show the family honor, ~name~.
In the army, they discourage looting, generally.
Oh, I see. You and your wife have a rather interesting relationship, Corrin.
Well, at least you have a body to back up that confidence.
I enjoy a man with some fight in him!
This may sound like an excuse to look at your... rear...
Impressive, ~clothing~!
Your ~clothing~?
~Clothing~, huh?
I was curious about what that gem was. It reminds me of Princess Jasmine's, in some of her outfits.
I’ve got a lot of respect for a woman who’s willing to go out into the world and fight for a cause she respects and people she loves.
Oh, your gloves? I... tend to like wrists.
Of course you can't sit out the next few rounds, Catria.
You know, I do have quite a lot of experience with armor, Catria. If you want help...
Are you sure you aren't a princess, Elizabeth? You're awfully coy...
Don't worry, Elizabeth. A lady needs nice legs. I feel like my legs are suitable for a soldier.
♩ Don't be so shy-- ♩
It's obvious you're quite a skilled warrior... but why not be honorable?
I'm surprised you gave up your wand so quickly, Lotte.
Oh. Of course, taking off armor is quite the challenge for men and women.
Ai-yah! A spirit?! You truly must be a powerful Taoist magician indeed!
You're treating it like no big deal!
Most of the Princesses I know who use magic don't use it to show off...
I was curious about what that gem was. It reminds me of... attire a woman I knew wore.
You are such a sweet one, Sayori.
I see woman everywhere like lots of layers... I'm surprised your outfit is so... drab.
I suppose if you're here to bond with someone, you would want to be fast about it...
I'm a fan of the sash, and your outfit. Loose, flowing clothes are so much better than heavy armor...
Purple hair, a matching outfit…
Ah, that is lovely.
PH Challenge
My question, for our wager, ~name~: What world are you really from? What’s it like there? Most importantly, are you here to… pillow down with a human?
My question, from one person out of sorts to another, ~name~: Have you always felt like… you didn’t quite fit in with what was expected of you?
Most cats are pretty capricious… But do you also have the same types of urges that they do… as far as a need to breed? It would seem that way, based on what I can see from here.

When you’re a Princess, at least from my known worlds, there’s a certain… acceptance that people are going to love you for more than just your good deeds. Do you enjoy the fact people masturbate to you? I’m… uncertain.
You lost my challenge, ~name~! How did you really expect this to go? I’m not exactly shy… but you’re either very brave, or really foolish. I can respect either, but an honest answer would be nice.

My question should be pretty easy, ~name~: Has your hair always been like that? I know that’s not a terribly interesting question, but most of the worlds I’ve visited or heard of have exotic styles rather than colors.
My question, ~name~, for our wager: So you’re a fairy… do all fairy godmothers have needs like this, or are you just the guardian of a rather unfortunate child?
You lost the bet, ~name~! What sort of combat style to like to employ? I’m quite skilled with a sword, but I admit the roar of a canon or the explosion of gunpowder really makes my fire rage.
I would’ve imagined a professional gambler’d have done better at a game of cards. What’s your favorite game besides this? And, while I’m at it, your favorite game to play while naked?

You lost the bet, ~name~! Is a game like this something you enjoy? I’ve heard of you before, ~name~, and it all seems to be very… lewd. I may have heard the stories at an army camp. The details are… lurid.
Are those horns made out of bone, or something softer? I… can see the merits of them, provided they aren’t too sharp in fulfilling some fantasies.
You’re a minstrel of some sort, or a census-taker, right? Given how you’ve sought to record so much information today. It’s a little nice to be the one getting the attention now though, isn’t it?
You lost the bet, ~name~! Are you doing anything after this? You seem like you could use some attention, and I’d promise to be gentle…
Did you pick your outfit, ~name~, or was it given to you? I have to think something so frilly makes it quite… breezy to move around with. Do you ever imagine using your ribbons for something else?
Now that you’ve lost the challenge, are you going to start being nice, or do you want me to punish you? I’ve learned a few very persuasive tricks…

Piloting a machine is much like riding a horse… but I can’t say I’ve ever taken care of myself while riding. It seems… awful to do that to Khan. But you have a room to yourself in your mech. Do you regularly masturbate or sleep with people there?
My question, ~name~: When you tend to your patients, ~name~, is it purely clinical? I… would honor my duties, but I would certainly think about them when I’d finished tending to them.
So, from one soldier to another, and since you lost: It was always… different, to try and satisfy myself at camp. Any advice for how you slip away?
So, ~name~, you lost! What exactly do you serve as a model for?
You lost the bet, ~name~, but here's an easy one. Do you try to be so cute and sweet? Or is it honestly just something that comes naturally? That would explain why I’m me, I suppose.
I know hungry ghosts and dragons are real, of course. What princess or sensible person doesn’t… but you’re not just here to find a breeding partner, right, ~name~?
My question, ~name~, since you lost: Does it hurt to be pierced like that? It seems like a bit much just for more places to wear jewelry.
Here's my question, since you lost, ~name~. What was the biggest haul of treasure you’ve ever claimed, ~name~?
I don’t think I’ve ever met someone with such pointed ears! Is your hearing exceptional? Can you hear my heartbeat? I’m… quite compelled by you, ~name~. That's my question, since you lost.
Here's my question, ~name~, since you lost the bet: As a prince, you doubtless have many options for concubines or wives. Was it you who organized this game?
A princess should love and be beloved by her people… but, it would seem you have a more direct interest in them. Have you ever been involved with a commoner?
So, ~name~, you lost the bet: How’d you get those scars?
You lost the challenge, ~name~! Here's my question: Are you the ghost of a man or woman, or something else, ~name~?
Well, ~name~, you lost! I’ll admit, I wasn’t much for academics. What’s your favorite subject? I know it isn’t a terribly exciting question, but I make the questions on my terms.
I’ve heard that the unquiet dead often seek out the living to slake unholy lusts… I never would’ve imagined it was a literal lust. Does that concern you, ~name~?
Can you use your wings to fly, or do you prefer them to shelter your paramours? Can I touch? At least answer the first part, since that was the condition of our game, after all.
I'd hope it'd be you that lost the bet, ~name~. How exactly does your magic work?
You lost. My question! So you're an android. Does a game like this help you feel human? Do you even want to?
You've lost, ~player~. I want to know what you think about the game! Feel free to make a post on the subreddit. Making a character is easy, if you have a friend for us!
Mr. McCree, you lost. Do you prefer your women on top or on bottom? I prefer to be on top, myself.
You lost the challenge, Pit! My question: who is the strongest mortal you've ever known?
Sorry you had to lose, but sometimes you just got to go for the throat! Even--especially--in friendly games of chance!
Like a lotus blossom. Soft, and refined!
Let's keep this up! It's so fun to gamble with other women.
Is it really reasonable for you to fire that indoors?
O-oh. I see. You didn't know. Suffice to say, you have a wonderful... butt.
I'd say you're far more than half decent, Elizabeth! Modesty is quite the virtue for you, isn't it?
W-what? Where'd Elizabeth go?
And white underwear seems very pure. Are you sure you're not a princess?
Surely, you aren't... this foolish, are you, Ini?
I wonder if Ini is just pretending to be this stupid.
I thought mine worked better, Princess Jasmine.
Bring it on, then.
This Akko person seems... rather intrusive.
Is that true, Akko? That's quite indecent of you.
I suppose it depends on the nature of the spell, but you seem trustworthy, so why not?
Huh? Where did Ladybug go? I didn’t expect to need to deal with sorcery tonight…
Fortunately, I don't mind a bit of forwardness. I would hope you're the same.
Like how they dress, what they like, and so on.
Wait a minute. You aren't a Crown Prince at all! I can't believe I didn't see it Sooner!
Well, it seems only fair, given that you've been saving your energy. Of course, you'd need to lose twice more, Crown Prince.
You bring honor to your friends for your sacrifices, Nagisa.
Phew. I suppose in a game like this, you'd need clothes. Obviously.
...But I didn’t come here to debate philosophy with ghosts… whatever you’re going to do, try to be gentle with Nayru.
But never one with pointed ears or long blue hair. Sorry this is a late question, I’ve just been thinking how best to ask it.
Ai-yah. You're beautiful! Why try and hide away?
Reaching for the bottle? The mark of faltering courage, when not offered by friends.
A truly noble soul is never at a loss for words. Your real class is showing, Miss Remilia.
Or so I would assume.
I suppose your ribbon is quite pretty...
I know it's difficult... but as long as you do your best, even in defeat, there's honor!
...an assassin? That's disappointing...
You've already worked up a good sweat, I see. Impressive!
Though, I think I'd look good in your pants.
I admire your forthrightness, if not your modesty.
Impressive, ~name~. I must confess I'm personally familiar with larger opponents…
PH Challenge
My question, for our wager, ~name~: What world are you really from? What’s it like there? Most importantly, are you here to… pillow down with a human?
My question, from one person out of sorts to another, ~name~: Have you always felt like… you didn’t quite fit in with what was expected of you?
Most cats are pretty capricious… But do you also have the same types of urges that they do… as far as a need to breed? It would seem that way, based on what I can see from here.

When you’re a Princess, at least from my known worlds, there’s a certain… acceptance that people are going to love you for more than just your good deeds. Do you enjoy the fact people masturbate to you? I’m… uncertain.
You lost my challenge, ~name~! How did you really expect this to go? I’m not exactly shy… but you’re either very brave, or really foolish. I can respect either, but an honest answer would be nice.

My question should be pretty easy, ~name~: Has your hair always been like that? I know that’s not a terribly interesting question, but most of the worlds I’ve visited or heard of have exotic styles rather than colors.
My question, ~name~, for our wager: So you’re a fairy… do all fairy godmothers have needs like this, or are you just the guardian of a rather unfortunate child?
You lost the bet, ~name~! What sort of combat style to like to employ? I’m quite skilled with a sword, but I admit the roar of a canon or the explosion of gunpowder really makes my fire rage.
I would’ve imagined a professional gambler’d have done better at a game of cards. What’s your favorite game besides this? And, while I’m at it, your favorite game to play while naked?

You lost the bet, ~name~! Is a game like this something you enjoy? I’ve heard of you before, ~name~, and it all seems to be very… lewd. I may have heard the stories at an army camp. The details are… lurid.
Are those horns made out of bone, or something softer? I… can see the merits of them, provided they aren’t too sharp in fulfilling some fantasies.
Ai-yah! I've seen horses with smaller weaponry! And rest assured, I may be into many things, but that is not one of them.
You’re a minstrel of some sort, or a census-taker, right? Given how you’ve sought to record so much information today. It’s a little nice to be the one getting the attention now though, isn’t it?
You lost the bet, ~name~! Are you doing anything after this? You seem like you could use some attention, and I’d promise to be gentle…
Did you pick your outfit, ~name~, or was it given to you? I have to think something so frilly makes it quite… breezy to move around with. Do you ever imagine using your ribbons for something else?
Now that you’ve lost the challenge, are you going to start being nice, or do you want me to punish you? I’ve learned a few very persuasive tricks…

Piloting a machine is much like riding a horse… but I can’t say I’ve ever taken care of myself while riding. It seems… awful to do that to Khan. But you have a room to yourself in your mech. Do you regularly masturbate or sleep with people there?
My question, ~name~: When you tend to your patients, ~name~, is it purely clinical? I… would honor my duties, but I would certainly think about them when I’d finished tending to them.
So, from one soldier to another, and since you lost: It was always… different, to try and satisfy myself at camp. Any advice for how you slip away?
So, ~name~, you lost! What exactly do you serve as a model for?
You lost the bet, ~name~, but here's an easy one. Do you try to be so cute and sweet? Or is it honestly just something that comes naturally? That would explain why I’m me, I suppose.
I know hungry ghosts and dragons are real, of course. What princess or sensible person doesn’t… but you’re not just here to find a breeding partner, right, ~name~?
My question, ~name~, since you lost: Does it hurt to be pierced like that? It seems like a bit much just for more places to wear jewelry.
Here's my question, since you lost, ~name~. What was the biggest haul of treasure you’ve ever claimed, ~name~?
I don’t think I’ve ever met someone with such pointed ears! Is your hearing exceptional? Can you hear my heartbeat? I’m… quite compelled by you, ~name~. That's my question, since you lost.
Here's my question, ~name~, since you lost the bet: As a prince, you doubtless have many options for concubines or wives. Was it you who organized this game?
A princess should love and be beloved by her people… but, it would seem you have a more direct interest in them. Have you ever been involved with a commoner?
So, ~name~, you lost the bet: How’d you get those scars?
You lost the challenge, ~name~! Here's my question: Are you the ghost of a man or woman, or something else, ~name~?
Well, ~name~, you lost! I’ll admit, I wasn’t much for academics. What’s your favorite subject? I know it isn’t a terribly exciting question, but I make the questions on my terms.
I’ve heard that the unquiet dead often seek out the living to slake unholy lusts… I never would’ve imagined it was a literal lust. Does that concern you, ~name~?
Can you use your wings to fly, or do you prefer them to shelter your paramours? Can I touch? At least answer the first part, since that was the condition of our game, after all.
I'd hope it'd be you that lost the bet, ~name~. How exactly does your magic work?
You've lost, ~player~. I want to know what you think about the game! Feel free to make a post on the subreddit. Making a character is easy, if you have a friend for us!
I suppose getting to see Fujin and this sword was far from the worst outcome.
Ai-yah! Here I was, worried you were overcompensating! I suppose you'd be right at home in the Wang dynasty.
Impressive. I don't suppose I could give it a swing or two? I've never handled a drill like that.
I suppose this is your last chance to surprise us, ~name~...
I know my disguise wasn’t fooling as many people here as I’d have wished, but… if you have disguised yourself as a woman, ~name~, I would certainly be impressed.
You lost the bet, ~name~! What sort of combat style to like to employ? I’m quite skilled with a sword, but I admit the roar of a canon or the explosion of gunpowder really makes my fire rage.
A princess should love and be beloved by her people… but, it would seem you have a more direct interest in them. Have you ever been involved with a commoner?
Oh my, how exotic. That… thong, is something a courtesan would wear… but a high class one.
Huh! I haven’t seen underwear like that before. It just shows off everything so well! I might have to invest in a pair of those before I head home.
But as someone once said, a journey of a thousand miles…
Oh, come now, Catria. Well, don't come yet...
In truth, the rumors you hear of the other Princesses aren't wholly accurate...
Well, I guess now we'll see your true face!
Ah, you must be from a world near the Land of Dragons... I see that women there are... afforded more freedom, perhaps.
I respect your conviction, Crown Prince. If I weren't loyal to my emperor, I would surely find myself in the host of your elite warriors.
Hm. I've heard of some women covering themselves in flowers...
Well, Mushu is always nude. And Elsa has a bad habit about getting naked around Anna, and I don’t always think she’s quite human…
I guess we'll see...
Though, let's see how you look when you're alone and naked.
I was actually quite impressed with your underwear! It looks so comfortable... but...
Whoa, hold on, Twilight, there’s no need to be so vulgar so soon--
Oh. Nevermind then. I guess I should've trained more for this...
Surely, you're wearing underwear? Of some divine type?
Surely, unlike Futaba, you wore some kind of underwear?
I think you'd keep things very, very interesting, as a member of our society.
Not bad. More things like your ~clothing~ and you’ll be out in no time at all.
I'm no perfect porcelain doll. More like a training dummy. Uh, but smart. You can take more off next time, ~name~.
I'm uh, used to girls doing the flourish you're doing. Both of the jacket and of the trivia.
It's hard not to stare. You're so striking!
I would want to keep something like that in good condition, personally.
I hope you weren't planning on stopping there.
...and I'd wager you're made of stronger stuff than that, aren't you, Kamina?
Oh, no, Pit. Nothing at all. Only master warriors tend to wear white, since they can avoid getting dirt or blood on it. Impressive.
I imagine the two of you would get along well!
Are you certain you don't know any of these people? Hm. I suppose the world is a large enough place...
I’d taunt you about being beaten by a girl, but that seems a little demeaning to both of us.
I don’t want to seem entitled… but I had expected my reveal to be met more with applause. I suppose women aren’t very interesting to you, ~name~?
Hm. I suppose that's an acceptable play. Not thrilled it was your ~clothing~, if I'm honest.
Something bigger next time, right?
He’s even pale and kind of translucent!
I had to inherit mine, even though my father’s got a… slightly different build.
I'm a little less... cavalier than you about it.
--oh. Not the sword I had been expecting, but a lovely blade.
You know, I hadn't really considered that...
So you can stop time... I can think of a few uses for that.
Well, if that's true, Kamina, I suppose I gave it away earlier.
Man or woman, it's a virtue to fight someone so... persistent!
Do I need to tell you again not to underestimate me, Kamina? I don't mind proving it, either.
You certainly seem capable. I'm looking forward to further displays of bravery, here.
In my land, yellow is associated with rising spirits. I suppose with your wings, you're used to basking in the sunlight.
It's not a challenge, or anything. I was just... a little jealous.
I’ve only seen this a few times… but I can tell a lot based on sound and rustling sheets…
Let's see how a manly-man does it.
Women need their time, right? Time to put on makeup… to finish… to learn martial arts and defend the family honor… you know, sexy, uh, womanly things.
Is this how you say goodbye to those you’ve known, ~name~? Thinking of a romance shared under some falling petals? Um, don’t mind me. Just… thinking.
You lost your bet, D.Va. I want you to answer my question! How often do you have sex in your mech?
This game’s become… a little more open-minded than I’d anticipated it being…
Fapping? Did you mean Fa Ping? That’s uh, who I am, yes. Sometimes, anyway.
I suppose this is a little less weird than Elsa and Anna.
(What a woman!)
If you're as adept on the battlefield as you are in the bedroom...
Flexibility is important... after all...
Do you really think a man would do that, Lotte?
Oh... this is... quite...
Go on, Lotte, I want to hear more...
This is quite something!
At a brothel, once, I knew a woman who enjoyed being restrained... I see this is how spirits would do it.
I suppose you could get interesting angles if you were floating...
I've never watched a spirit do this... quite compelling, noble or not.
I lost my armor, but looks like ~name~’s the one who dropped her guard!
~name~, you look like you’re having fun! Trust me, you’ve seen one person naked, you’ve, uh, seen a lot of them naked?
Hey! ~name~, stand up at attention. Sorry, sorry, just used to commands. Take your time, but take it quickly.
This’s all in good fun, right, ~name~?
Find a path of your own, ~name~. Well, the path forward’s mostly full of peril and nudity. But I guess even you can be brave, can’t you?
A warrior knows when to admire another’s technique… when it comes your turn to lose, I can’t imagine how beautiful such a canvas will be, your fingers… slick with…
It's important to admire the trappings of others... such as when one glimmers in the soft flicker of a candle... ah… f-forgive me. A moment of poetry struck me.
You lost, Sayaka! Do these "witches" of yours often involve a sexual component? What was the worst thing you've done to slay a witch like that?

Sorry, forgive the rambling, you look wonderful in the flesh-- uh, you’d look good as a statue too, I think.
Y-you don't wear underwear. What a strange... choice.

Oh, I see. Women with blue hair don't have hair there, I suppose.

Well, if an expert does it, maybe I should shave...

Picky, picky, picky…
Are we in this together, or not, ~name~?
Being polite and demure might make one a good wife, but a rather frustrating opponents in cards.

Love the hairstyle and qipao, Chun-Li. I feel like we’re gonna be good friends.
And to let you wear such a feminine outfit… That Overwatch place is doing something right.
Huh? You aren't a princess? You could've fooled me!
I-I'm not familiar with princesses at all! That's why I asked. I guess a princess wouldn't just lift her skirt like that, though...
I guess every princess should have something that's iconic and special.
You should learn to use your bracelets to propel you to new heights, Ini. I did that once.
Sigh. At least she's reasonably cute.
Let’s just say I’m sure both of us are familiar with various varieties and split the difference, hm, Kyu?
I know quite a few princesses. You seem to act more like them than the witches I usually hear about. A witch princess, even.
It looks lovely! If you want to talk about bad hair days, you should meet Rapunzel. I think she's from a world near yours...
If we could not ruin some surprises, Mahiru, I’d be quite grateful.
Thank you for continuing to do our people proud, Mei.
Perhaps I should talk to you about modernizing my armor… against the cold, if nothing else.
As you can tell by my attire, I like to remain mobile. That looks... very tight.
I hope you didn't plan to win by deceiving us, Crown Prince.
Uh. Nevermind me. I'll just... be here. Eating my words.
If I knew we could've come in our modern apparel, I could've forgone the bulky armor...
Such a young girl, and so convicted. I imagine that your friends and ancestors are proud of you. Do they allow women in the army, from where you’re from?
Thank you, Lady Palutena, you honor me.
Hm. I thought this would be a friendly game of cards...
I may keep secrets, but I don’t bring shame upon my ancestors with every action!
I don't think I take it your extreme, nor would I ever.
Though, it is much nicer to do so in cards or words rather than with swords or explosions or avalanches.
You do have dragons where you’re from… right?
I'm glad you're something of a witch-hunter. Many princesses struggle with witches, you know.
I’m impressed! By a woman doing that kind of a job. Definitely really impressive. Really, really impressive.
You're quite skilled at cards, Sheena! How are you doing those tricks...?
I just thought it odd that your clothing is so bright, but it seems designed to be stealthy.
You're a little irreverent, Zizou. I suppose you don't require much... deference... from mortals.
I see. I was wondering if... nevermind.
It's important to enjoy the little things in life. But I think it's worth savoring the big ones too. Like your ~clothing~, ~name~.
I'm just impressed you can keep pace with me. Any other contests you think you want me to beat you at?
Don't worry, ~name~, I'm sure some nice woman will make a great househusband of you yet.
It’s nice to be able to ask a man about lacy, feminine things without having a grunt or overt response.
I'll be honest, I was expecting a bit more decorum, Jin.
20,000 of anything sounds really expensive. You're quite the sharp dresser.
Ha! Well said. And... impressive. The speech, and...
Though I'm not sure who'd find it more arousing than just inspiring.
That’s… quite alluring. Your face captures your enjoyment well.
You aren't going to stop time and make us miss it, are you?
I'll certainly be learning from the experience, after all.
Many women don't appreciate the effort that goes into a physique like that. Believe me when I tell you I admire the hard work more than just the result.

Piloting a machine is much like riding a horse… but I can’t say I’ve ever taken care of myself while riding. It seems… awful to do that to Khan. But you have a room to yourself in your mech. Do you regularly masturbate or sleep with people there?
My question, ~name~: When you tend to your patients, ~name~, is it purely clinical? I… would honor my duties, but I would certainly think about them when I’d finished tending to them.
So, from one soldier to another, and since you lost: It was always… different, to try and satisfy myself at camp. Any advice for how you slip away?
So, ~name~, you lost! What exactly do you serve as a model for?

I know hungry ghosts and dragons are real, of course. What princess or sensible person doesn’t… but you’re not just here to find a breeding partner, right, ~name~?

Here's my question, since you lost, ~name~. What was the biggest haul of treasure you’ve ever claimed, ~name~?

A princess should love and be beloved by her people… but, it would seem you have a more direct interest in them. Have you ever been involved with a commoner?
So, ~name~, you lost the bet: How’d you get those scars?
You lost the challenge, ~name~! Here's my question: Are you the ghost of a man or woman, or something else, ~name~?
Well, ~name~, you lost! I’ll admit, I wasn’t much for academics. What’s your favorite subject? I know it isn’t a terribly exciting question, but I make the questions on my terms.
I’ve heard that the unquiet dead often seek out the living to slake unholy lusts… I never would’ve imagined it was a literal lust. Does that concern you, ~name~?
Can you use your wings to fly, or do you prefer them to shelter your paramours? Can I touch? At least answer the first part, since that was the condition of our game, after all.

But I can see a chest that I wouldn't mind bringing home with me tonight.

What a lawless place you must be from, bounty hunter. I suppose you're some sort of wanderer too, huh?

Such vivid hair! Is it common where you're from?
That’s such a small cannon you have… I bet it doesn’t even cause big explosions.
Your alchemists must be clever, arming you with such a small cannon.
A cannon can be useful, but I’ll always prefer the steel of a sword or the meat of my fists. That uh, sounds suitably masculine, right?
I’m no stranger to magic… well, I’m not very familiar with it… but I’ll always prefer bone and steel to sorcery.
So you… pilot mecha? Who doesn’t want to be part of something bigger than themselves, right, ~name~?
I actually do know a bit about mecha stuff. Engineering is fascinating.
It’s easy to tell when someone else has the bearing of a soldier.
What sort of battles have you fought in, ~name~? It’s easy to tell when someone’s disciplined.
~Name~’s a bit unnatural… but the only monsters I’ve ever met are human. I’ll give you a chance to prove yourself, ~name~. You deserve that much.
I see video games have caught up to the catchy tunes of Disney movies.
Hm… I see your world keeps an open mind about their heroes. And their weaponry. Shall we spar?
There’s something very unusual about you, ~name~... You don’t happen to be some sort of spirit? If so, have you met Mushu, one of the many Fa spirit guides?
I’ve never actually run into a witch, but they’re pretty spooky. You seem spookily pretty, though.
He’s so delicate…
Your armor fits like a glove.
Are you a soldier of some sort, Jin?
You are... certainly forward with your intentions.
For someone that's clairvoyant, you're quite bad at predicting losses, Jin.
Well, hello there, handsome.
I'm still interested in how you took off your clothes last turn, Jotaro.
Took you long enough. Keep that up, and I might just fall for you.
I'm strong enough to admit that I'd be lying if I said I wasn't interested...
Let's see what you've got left.
Your chest is impressive, but you should work on your legs...
I'm hoping you're keeping the glasses.
I'll admit, I love a rousing speech.
You're not from around here, are you, Pit?
Your attire is quite unusual, Ryuji, if you don't mind me saying.
If you were going to think of me, looking so put together in my armor…
